title: 107 75 15 "Kingnapped""Operation Utopia Commences! The Swell of Rebellion Stirs!"Transliteration: "Yūtopia sakusen hatsudō! Ugokidashita uneri" (Japanese:ユートピア作戦発動!動き出した) Kōnosuke Uda Michiru Shimada April 14, 2002(2002-04-14)[46] July 8, 2006[47]
transformers_text: 107 75 15 King napped Operation Utopia Commences The Swell of Rebellion Stirs Transliteration Y topi a sak use n hat sud Ugo kid as hit a u neri Japanese K no suke Uda Michiru Shimada April 14 2002 2002 04 14 46 July 8 2006 47 Baroque Works ' plan to take over A la bast a is set in motion The king is kidnapped and Mr 2 impersonates him framing him for ordering the destruction of Nan ohana to cover up the Dance Powder incident there and the rebel army begins to move
